sentences.en: We told the boy playing in our yard to vamoose.
sentences.cn: 我们叫那个在我们家院子里玩的男孩脚底抹油快点溜.

sentences.en: We told those boy playing in our yard to vamoose.
sentences.cn: 我们叫那些在我们家后院子里玩的男孩赶快走开.

sentences.en: What reason vamoose is people can'ts help wanting to ask him after all this factory?…
sentences.cn: 人们不禁要问他究竟是什么原因匆匆离开这个厂？

trans.tran_en: to leave a place hurriedly; decamp
